name: Take a survey 2
description:
Original game: https://chocolatecookiebro.itch.io/take-a-survey

In this sequel to Take a Survey, you are taking a survey that has been revamped due to reports. The survey seems fine, until you reach the end and find out the survey wants to go a little longer. There are two endings.

Main bg music: 

teatime by Roa | https://soundcloud.com/roa_music1031/
